text: The 2017 season for the cycling team began in January at the Tour Down Under. As a UCI WorldTeam, they were automatically invited and obligated to send a squad to every event in the UCI World Tour. ==Team roster== ;Riders who joined the team for the 2017 season {| class="wikitable" |- !
